DESTINATIONS.name: Bali, Indonesia
DESTINATIONS.description: Experience the perfect blend of beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and spiritual tranquility in the Island of Gods.

DESTINATIONS.name: Santorini, Greece
DESTINATIONS.description: Marvel at stunning sunsets, white-washed buildings, and crystal-clear waters in this cycladic paradise.

DESTINATIONS.name: Tokyo, Japan
DESTINATIONS.description: Immerse yourself in the perfect combination of traditional culture and cutting-edge technology.

DESTINATIONS.name: Swiss Alps, Switzerland
DESTINATIONS.description: Discover breathtaking mountain landscapes, pristine lakes, and charming alpine villages.

DESTINATIONS.name: Maldives
DESTINATIONS.description: Relax in overwater bungalows and experience the world's most spectacular marine life.

DESTINATIONS.name: New York City, USA
DESTINATIONS.description: Explore the city that never sleeps with its iconic landmarks, Broadway shows, and diverse neighborhoods.
